name: Folders Plugin 6.17
body:
<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->
* document sample value for interval (#172) @bruce-szalwinski
* chore: Enable JDK11 build (#194) @Vlatombe

name: Folders Plugin 6.16
body:
<!-- Optional: add a release summary here -->
* Fix to use the icon element in folder title (#186) @bitwiseman
* [JENKINS-66168](https://issues.jenkins.io/browse/JENKINS-66168) - Fix the Disable/Enable button for non primary views (#185) @Dohbedoh
* Update template (#184) @fcojfernandez
* Fix roundrip of the `disabled` field on folders (#180) @Vlatombe
* Use Functions.printStackTrace (#160) @jglick

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Bump bom-2.222.x from 17 to 887.vae9c8ac09ff7 (#170) @dependabot
* Bump plugin from 4.13 to 4.16 (#176) @dependabot

name: Folders Plugin 6.15
body:
## 🚀 Features and Fixes
* [JENKINS-64069](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-64069) - Fix plugin / branch-api on 2.264 (#165) @timja
* [JENKINS-63836](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-63836) - Not add heath metrics by default in the Global Configuration (#153) @fbelzunc
* [JENKINS-63312](https://issues.jenkins-ci.org/browse/JENKINS-63312) - avoid unnecessary chaining of FolderComputations (#152) @thomasgl-orange

## 📦 Dependency updates

* Refresh POM and dependencies (#169) @jglick

## :memo: Internal changes/Maintenance
* Enable dependabot to automatically get dependency updates (#154) @MRamonLeon
* Use diamond operator, remove superflous throws and fixed some deprecation warnings (#151) @StefanSpieker
